title: Ranked Disconnect
body:
Dear Riot,
I am so frustrated about ranked! I'm currently sitting on silver 3 promos after hard work from bronze 3 this season. I was originally on silver 2 with 82lp. What i'm trying to say is ALOT and i mean ALOT of my games always results in a disconnected person leaving my team 4 v 5. This is really Unfair for me. I have wasted so many hours and days trying to get to Gold, but these people keep weighing me down. I know this is not your fault, but please do something about this? Right now My rank is based on my team's connection for the entire game or not. I don't mind if its a loss with a Fair 5 v 5. Or even feeders. But 4 v 5 is just not cool! I really hope you guys have a solution for this, to compensate me and others. I really think I should be in High Silver or gold by now, if you minus all the disconnected teammates I had. Please Riot, I got a solution. Compensate LP, or let a summoner do a redo on their promos. This is the most simple and FAIR solution you can do. Without losing anything. Please, Please do something similar or a better one! and Please read this asap, and compensate me and others before season 5 ends! I really want to get to Gold 5 before Preseason.!!! I really enjoy playing, especially with my friends, but rank really frustrates me, and I don't enjoy it sometimes because of these ranked disconnected teammates. 

Thank You for reading! I hope I get compensated in any way before this season ends!!! I really want the Gold 5 border.

replies.body: What about minusing all the LP you won when enemies dcd? You cant complain and say you're losing LP from people afking while ignoring the fact that you also WIN just as many games from enemies leaving.
How about you get less LP from that? Cause if 1 Person Dsced. Then ALL 10 people no LP!? Waste of time? ANd I rarely get that tbh, probably twice this year, not lying.

Then basically, My Solo Queue Rank, is based on my team's connection throughout the game and not a fair 5 v 5 teamwork?
I find that really annoying and frustrating, Riot needs to change this.
Seems to me you're either exaggerating or have the worst luck ever. This entire season I have only had 2 games where someone has disconnected / quit.

I'm not exaggerating, I had a 12 lose streak and half of it, is because of a dsc. 
Also not all games are beginning dsc. 
Some games I was very close to winning and on of the teammates dsc, resulting in the loss. 
That's what I want to get through. Winning into losing because of dsc.
I've looked at your "loss streak". No one  has left in those games. In your 20 most recent games however 2 people have left. So you are exaggerating.
I'm not exaggerating. there were 3 games that U can easily recognize a dsc! the others are last 5 minutes dsced. And some join back after 20 min, so it looks like they were there, but they weren't.
